alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:25PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Albany and southwestern Platte Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 525 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles southwest of Bordeaux, or 21 miles southwest of Wheatland, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Albany and southwestern Platte Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
